cannot_cast_message: You can't perform any of your rituals now!

name: To Keep Off the Rain and the Damp
description: Keep yourself from getting wet in the rain.  The charm will not keep you dry if you step into a water source.
message: You crush the leaves and wrap them in the cloth, touching it to you forehead, the crown of your head, both shoulders, and the backs of both wrists as you recite the words of the charm.

name: To Bring Light to Dark Places
description: Summon up a bobbing ball of light, just bright enough to read by.  You may activate the witchlight to dismiss it.
message: Takin a bit of oil on your fingertips, you trace a pattern in the air while reciting the words of the charm, and a glowing ball of light forms in the air.

name: To Bring Health to the Soil and Life to the Crops
description: While standing on soil or turned earth, perform a ritual to increase the bounty of the crops.  The casting of this charm must end within one hour of noon.
message: You dance slowly over the living earth, letting the seeds fall at the appropriate time, and as the sun climbs to its zenith you recite the last words of the charm.

name: To Kindle the Flames
description: Call forth the remnants of a fire from some ash to light a new flame.
message: You sprinkle the wood ash over the kindling as you recite the words of the charm.

name: To Spot the Goodly Folk
description: Using wild herbs and hawthorn berries, create an amulet that will tell you if any of the Fair Folk are nearby.
message: You laboriously sew the square of leather into a pouch and place the herbs and hawthorn berries inside.  Chanting softly, you seal the bag and attach the string to it so it can be worn around your neck.

name: To Perceive the Mazzikin
description: Using blood and ashes and certain herbs, create a paste that when rubbed on the eyes, will allow you to perceive otherworldly beings even in darkness or through walls.  It will inhibit your mundane sight, however.
message: You grind the bones to powder and mix in the blood and herbs while rhythmically chanting the words of the charm, and when you're done you have a dark, foul-smelling paste as the reward of your labors.

name: Maze the Little Folk
description: A spell to create a snare for catching one of the little folk, a changeling.  Has no effect on the elder spirits of wood and water, fire and earth, nor plant or man.
message: You skein a complicated cat's cradle with splinters of wood guiding the way in to blackberries at each of the focus points in your design.

name: To Befuddle As the Thunderstrike
description: While outdoors, recite a quick charm to produce a flash of light like unto a thunderbolt, bedazzling anyone around you.
message: You call out the words of the charm to the sky and there is a burst of light.

name.str: To Befuddle As the Thunderstrike Real

description.str: The actual spell that causes the effect.  It's a bug if you have it.

name: To Purge the Most Virulent Grippe
description: By adding particular herbs and a bit of iron to your tea while you recite the words of the charm over it, you can brew a tea that will prove a sovereign remedy to a cold or a flu.
message: You brew the tea, adding in a bit of scrap iron and herbs to mix in, while you recite a chant as you stir, and eventually the tea is ready.

name: To Ward Off the Evil Eye
description: With a bit of salt and some muttered words, deflect the gaze of the evil eye.
message: You toss a bit of salt over your left shoulder with your right hand and spit three times into the folds of your clothing as you say, "Keneinahora".

name: To Thrice-Bar the Portal
description: With some string and the words of the charm, lock a door firmly, even one that doesn't have a locking mechanism.
message: You wind the cord several times around your fingers, muttering the words of the charm, and as the pattern ends you hear a soft thud.

name: The Coin of Gad
description: With a candle, a penny, and paper, this will create a short lived luck charm upon oneself.
message: You write the words upon the paper, place the penny on the ground, place the paper upon the penny, light the candle then the paper and firmly place the candle in the ashes on top of the penny, let the candle burn down melting all over the penny.  You will find your steps slightly lucky for the several hours to potentially a full day.

name: To See Beyond the Barriers
description: Gain a brief vision of what lies beyond a wall or a doorway.
message: You close your eyes and place the shards of glass over them and press, just slightly.  As the pain blooms and the blood trickles, you see beyond.

name.str: To See Beyond the Barriers Real

description.str: The actual spell that causes the effect for To See Beyond the Barriers.  It's a bug if you have it.

name: To Sooth the Pains and Injuries of the Flesh
description: Mix a paste of herbs, water, and willow bark and rub it on the target's wounds.  The charm increases the speed at which wounds heal, as long as the target does not engage in any strenuous activity.
message: You grind the herbs and willowbark together with the water, making a thick, woody-smelling paste, and rub it on the target.

name: To Halt the Scarlet Flow
description: With some whispered words and a mixture of iron, salt, and herbs, increase your ability to stop the flow of blood.  Best recited right before bandaging a wound.
message: You face toward the east and recite the words of the charm as you rub the iron and salt and herbs on your hands.

name: To Vanish Amidst the Leaves
description: While standing in a forest, conceal your presence.  For a brief time after using the charm, anything looking at you will only see another bit of foliage.  Movement or taking any hostile action will cancel the charm.
message: You wrap the beans in the leaf and, with a slight grimace, recite the words of the charm before you put them in your mouth and hold them there.

name: To Sail on the River of Dreams
description: With lavender and thyme, weave a barrier around your sleeping space to keep bad dreams away.  You must perform the charm directly before trying to sleep; moving will breach the barrier and allow the nightmares to find a way in again.
message: You place the herbs under your pillow and, while chanting the words of the charm, paint some thyme oil on the four corners of your sleeping space.

name: To Walk the Forests with the Brown One
description: Over the freshly-slain and butchered corpse of a bear, recite a paean to its spirit while using its fur and sinew and skull to create a garment.  Putting the garment on will take the spirit of the bear into yourself, allowing you to assume its form until the garment is removed.
message: As you recite the words of the charm, you sew the bits of fur together into a rough mantle with the bear skull at the top.

name: To Walk Across the Flowing Waters
description: While standing with your feet in the water, recite this charm to have the water bear you up.  You must keep moving at a steady pace, without running or stopping for more than a few moments, or the charm will fade.

name: To Bless the Sacred Weapon
description: Ensorcell an iron or steel weapon that you are holding so it does additional damage to unholy creatures when used in melee combat.  If the weapon is too damaged, the charm will cease to function.

description.str: This is the extra damage a blessed weapon does to Nether creatures.  It's a bug if you have it directly.

name: To Project the Etheric Form
description: After a period of trance and meditation, send out your disembodied spirit to wander the world.  Use of this ritual is <color_yellow>very tiring</color> and you will become increasingly more weary the longer you remain out of your body.
message: You settle down and slip into a trance.

name: To Shield the Mind from Assault
description: The first principle of psychic self-defense is to make sure your mind is in proper order so there is no foothold an assault can take advantage of.  While in effect, your mind is protected against psychic attack.  <color_red>Too much pain</color> will disrupt your concentration.
message: You settle down and begin ordering your mind.

name: Follow the Silver Cord
description: Follow the silver cord back to your body.

name: To Walk Upon the Water
description: Create a magic square that can later be used in a short ritual to walk across the surface of the water.
message: Focusing your mind and muttering the charms and spells under your breath, you carefully write down the patterns of the magic square.

name: To Operate Under the Water
description: Create a magic square that can later be used in a short ritual to breathe underwater.
message: Focusing your mind and muttering the charms and spells under your breath, you carefully write down the patterns of the magic square.

name: To Demolish Buildings and Strongholds
description: Create a magic square that can later be used in a short ritual to do massive damage to a nearby structure.
message: Focusing your mind and muttering the charms and spells under your breath, you carefully write down the patterns of the magic square.

name.str: To Demolish Buildings and Strongholds Real

description.str: The actual spell for To Demolish Buildings and Strongholds.  It's a bug if you have it directly.

name: To Cause Armed Men to Appear
description: Create a magic square to summon an ethereal group of soldiers who will attack your enemies.
message: Focusing your mind and muttering the charms and spells under your breath, you carefully write down the patterns of the magic square.

name: To Cause the Spirits to Bring us Anything We May Wish to Eat or to Drink
description: Create a magic square to cause an ethereal spirit to bring wine, meat, cheese, or bread to you.
message: Focusing your mind and muttering the charms and spells under your breath, you carefully write down the patterns of the magic square.

name: To Render Oneself Invisible Unto Every Person
description: Create a magic square to that will cause you to turn completely invisible.  Violent action will reveal your presence.
message: Focusing your mind and muttering the charms and spells under your breath, you carefully write down the patterns of the magic square.
